member.name: FILE_COMPRESSION_INFO
member.summary: Receives file compression information. Used for any handles. Use only when calling .

member.name: FILE_COMPRESSION_INFO.CompressedFileSize
member.summary: The file size of the compressed file.

member.name: FILE_COMPRESSION_INFO.CompressionFormat
member.summary: The compression format that is used to compress the file.

member.name: FILE_COMPRESSION_INFO.CompressionUnitShift
member.summary: The factor that the compression uses.

member.name: FILE_COMPRESSION_INFO.ChunkShift
member.summary: The number of chunks that are shifted by compression.

member.name: FILE_COMPRESSION_INFO.ClusterShift
member.summary: The number of clusters that are shifted by compression.
